/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and power lines, adding a touch of urban greenery to the cityscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the daily life and activity in this part of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban scene below.
